name: andyfaewatford
text: A comment left by andyfaewatford was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by sirhan_duran, NeoNaoNeo, flyterminator, TonyHighwind, deliciousmuffin, yomimono, Appers)

name: mercuri0us
text: And he always gets the first comment! What the hell ?!

name: riotdejaneiro
text:
Columbo can't figure out whether the first post guy is on coke or not.

Hilarious!

name: mikeronomicon
text: A comment left by mikeronomicon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by patkun, riotdejaneiro, Ariamaki, TonyHighwind, unkle_bob, Zem, TheSoulBear, kestral)

name: tasteful
text: you are annoying but i wish more people said negative things about this strip even though it's really good because it's just ridiculous how boring people are so i'm chubbying your almost as boring ass

name: deimosrising
text: I was using "what it is" and "faggots" in conjunction before this strip but only afterwards did I introduce "rock and roll"

name: riazm
text: This week, have some style, enter every room by saying "What it is you rock and roll faggots."

name: 7th_shot
text: I picked a terrible week to visit my mother.

name: dusty
text: by the way, your mom called, she wants me back.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: and to top it off, 69 chubbies.

name: sweetlips
text: Velcro?

name: nabeel84
text:
Rock and roll faggots = new term for straight people.

And holy shit does Chucklebot lay down the smack in this comic. His purpose of making me chuckle - fulfilled.

name: catachresis
text: Poor Vlad. His conversation is doomed.

name: hollis
text: Yet as always, he is unshaken.

name: soticoto
text:
Vlad is unshakable.
The conversation is his and his alone.

name: whuppins
text: The font used for Chucklebot's lines make all his ridiculous insults funnier.

name: spinynorman
text: If Stephen Hawking was a cartoon, his speech bubbles would be filled with this.

name: chrissketch
text: Stephen Hawking should do the voice work for Chucklebot in animated Achewood.

name: ford
text: I would pay upwards of fifty dollars to hear Stephen Hawking vocalizing the lines in this strip.  Not just some dude with a Hawking voice box, mind you, but the actual physicist himself.

name: ford
text: Although it would cost significantly more than fifty dollars to get Stephen Hawking to actually vocalize anything, i suppose.

name: mr_lostman28
text: OH BURN!

name: laserblade
text: Futurama managed.

name: jaldor
text: How could you tell?

name: centipede_damascus
text: The Paula Poundstone line is awesome. It's too bad it's one of those lines that can only be used once.

name: love_is_so_punk
text: The part of me that loves the cartoon Home Videos is really pissed off at the part of me that's cracking up at that panel, but the laughing part thinks it's even more hilarious that the uptight me is angry.

name: fineoakstructure
text: The part of you that loves the cartoon Home Videos is pretty pissed off that you forgot that the actual name is Home Movies.

name: junko
text: The last line is so good - that's the best burn you could possibly pull on Lie Bot

name: featurelessvoid
text: A comment left by featurelessvoid was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ezcmac, Mangtastic, dominus101, getawaykettle, GeyserShitdick, Axhoola, Audhumla, Darthemed)

name: connellingus
text: "Dago" refers to Italians, whereas Vlad is Slavic. Chucklebot and Lie Bot are just trading barbs and ignoring Vlad, so he is probably referring to Lie Bot.

name: saucy_jack
text: This is true, but it is odd either way. Lie Bot doesn't really have "sexuality" as any type of characteristic, but Vlad and Chucklebot are getting along just fine.

name: dj_douche
text: It's just the sideburns and highway patrol glasses that CB is dissin on, IMHO

name: shutup_shutup
text: Henry Winkler isn't Italian either.  I believe "faux" is the operative word here.

name: k_buttsworthe
text: CHOK E

name: serf
text: igneous thongs are most uncomfortable

name: killerlimpet
text: Lightweight pumice, with a smooth obsidian lining might be decent.

name: stuart
text: It's still rigid and loose!

name: dorothypoopbot
text: like... your mom?

name: johnmatrix
text: Note that Vlad's mouth changes in the second panel. Was this the only time this happened prior to the GOF?

name: echidnaboy
text: Whoa... It really is his mouth. I always thought that little line was his lower lip.

name: buttermoths
text: I'm quite sure it's his chin. If you look at The Badass Games strips, you'll see he had a goatee there for a short while.

name: dasilodavi
text: The robots turn on each other.  This must be where the Cylons were right after they decided to fucking kill everyone.

name: miked
text: a five, dammit! laughed till my beer came out my nose..

name: heyman
text: Prime-time friendly faux dago sexuality makes this.  I use it constantly on my italian friends

name: trollcollins
text: But is it faux if they are actually Italian? I would argue it is prime-time friendly genuine dago sexuality in such a case.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: nah, you call them not by their nationality. it would make some people upset, i'd imagine.

name: davidbowie
text: For me, Robots = 5

name: checkmatejones
text: I can't believe that there are over 10 strips rated higher than this.

name: boredom_man
text: Chubby for the avatar (mezzo-mezzo on the strip).

name: achilleselbow
text: I can't believe you'd say that given how many strips you've viewed, but to each his own.

name: dumase
text: Peter Jennings called. He says he wants his life back.

name: agentstinky
text: This is a good one but I think the alt text gets me the hardest.  I can picture Onstad typing "is goot...ah, fuck, I guess that works..."

name: softerworld
text: It is the most humourous font.

name: pogo
text: Respect to Poundstone.  It's not always easy being funny.

name: puguglypress
text: Especially for her!

name: eatmorekix
text: this comic is undervalued.

name: cycerin
text: Grenadine with a cock ring floater is the best idea this strip has ever given me.

name: possums
text: A comment left by possums was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by daidai, dismas, usversusthem)

name: cpnglxynchos
text: WHAT IT IS YOU ROCK AND ROLL FAGGOT

name: wonelove
text:
how exactly does one use the word GOOT ?]
somebody put it in context for me.

name: lowtrees
text: Goot God! Are you kidding?

name: dusty
text: VAR! goot god yous, vat is it being goot foor?

name: expellens
text: FIVE just for Chucklebot's line, "The first time you told that one, I laughed so hard I fell off my dinosaur . Genius. Pure titanium clad genius.

name: desert_donkey
text: the fonz and his 'faux dago sexuality'.. wow. that is one of the best things ever said.

name: tekende
text: This is one of my favorite strips. It's like concentrated ridiculous , distilled to its purest form.
